CustomField.description: Indicates whether any fields does not match with the current Account/Opportunity values.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK( Form_Submitted_Timestamp__c ), "", IF( CONTAINS( Match_Billing_Account_Name__c + Match_Billing_CC_Email__c + Match_Billing_City__c + Match_Billing_Country__c + Match_Billing_Phone_Number__c + Match_Billing_State_Province__c + Match_Billing_Street__c + Match_Billing_Zip_Postal_Code__c + Match_Bill_to_Contact_Email__c + Match_Invoice_Delivery_Method__c + Match_PO_Needed__c + Match_Split_One_off_Subscr_Invoice__c + Match_Taxable_Status__c + Match_VAT_Number__c,
"NO" ), "Unmatch", "Match" ) )
CustomField.label: Unmatch on Any Field?
